item.title: 7 Gadgets That'll Actually Get You Excited to Work Out
item.description:
7 Gadgets That'll Actually Get You Excited to Work Out

Gadgets and devices that make working out more enjoyable, including games, music players, and muscle trackers.

item.title: Inside the Stunning Mansion in Ex Machina
item.description:
Inside the Stunning Mansion in Ex Machina

There are many stunning, otherworldly sights in Ex Machina, the science-fiction film directed by Alex Garland that features a robot so lifelike she's played by actress Alicia Vikander. But the most breathtaking sight of all may be the 100 percent real, available-for-a-night's-stay location where the film is set: the Juvet Landscape Hotel in Norway.

item.title: Top Bartenders Name Their Favorite Drinking Cities
item.description:
Top Bartenders Name Their Favorite Drinking Cities

These are the best drinking cities, according to some of America's best bartenders, including New York, New Orleans, Portland,…

item.title: Experience a NASA Spacewalk Through the Lens of a GoPro Camera
item.description:
Experience a NASA Spacewalk Through the Lens of a GoPro Camera

Want to see what it's like to "walk" around in space outside the International Space Station? NASA wants to show you. The agency recently strapped GoPro cameras onto two astronauts to capture the wonder of spacewalks from their perspective.

item.title: Atmo Sfera Platterless Turntable Spins Vinyl in the Air
item.description:
Atmo Sfera Platterless Turntable Spins Vinyl in the Air

Chicago's Gramovox already defied gravity with their vertical Floating Record Player, and now Italian start-up Audio Deva offers their own "upside-down" take on a turntable. It eschews the basic design that has "remained the same for about a century."
